verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
"Lovest thou me"
Thou askest Lord of me
Would that my heart had
Power to answer Thee
"Thou know'st all things yea
Lord in heav'n above
And earth beneath
Thou knowest Thee I love"

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
But 'tis not so
In words in deed in thought
I do not - cannot love Thee
As I ought
Ah Lord Thy love must
Reach my aching heart
For all I need in love
Thyself Thou art

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Thy love must give that power
Thy love alone
There's nothing worthy
Of Thee but Thine own
Lord with the love
Wherewith Thou lovest me
Reflected on Thyself
Would I love Thee
